2 tablespoons olive oil,3 bell peppers,,2 to 3 zucchini,,2 summer squash,,1 cup grape tomatoes, halved,1 red onion, thinly sliced,6 cloves garlic, chopped,1 teaspoon herbs,1/2 teaspoon salt,1 pound salmon,1 orange, juiced,1/2 lemon, juiced,2 teaspoons agave syrup, or more to taste,1 clove garlic, minced,1/4 teaspoon leppo pepper flakes,salt to taste,,
